name: Misted
description:
What do you do when you can't trust your own senses?

What started as just a simple salvage operation to recover some company data turns into a nightmare as all is not right within the H-12 Mining Complex.

Misted is a short first person horror game made for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Shivers gamejam (Also my first ever game!)

Warning: Contains flashing lights and spooky shenanigans
